siteMetadata.description: A student double-majoring in computer science and chemical engineering.
siteMetadata.about: I am interested in the application of computer science to solving problems in more traditional engineering fields, namely chemical engineering. My studies currently focus on machine learning, artificial intelligence, and computational methods in chemical engineering.
